summary.about: Full-stack javascript developer. Interested in product as whole solution, from frontend (Angular - 4 years of experience, React - 2 years of experience) and backend (NodeJS - 4 years of experience) of web application to desktop app (Electron) and mobile native apps (React - native). Focused in creating amazing user experience (inspired by Don't Make Me Think by Steve Krug). Conducted technical interviews, code reviews and team lead of junior developers.

projects.description: Create Progressive Web Application(PWA) using Service Worker API and IndexedDB, frontend in React, Redux, Redux-Saga, backend created in NodeJs. Also created desktop application with Electron and mobile ios app in React-native. Server for scalability run on Docker. Created docker compose and ansible script for configure servers to use docker engine.
Development of web application for managing telecommunication base station(BTS).
Application for presenting banking risk data.
Personalise ID - Open Street maps editor for displaying electrical grids.
Application for managing expenses for business trips and training courses, with manager approval path, reports for accountants.

education.description: Major in Computer Science, Gdansk University of Technology, Faculty of Electronics, Telecommunications and Informatics
Major in Computer Science, Gdansk University of Technology, Faculty of Electronics, Telecommunications and Informatics

hobbies: sports(snowboarding, skiing, sailing, tennis, climbing, kitesurfing)
